scripts.clean:dev: rm -rf .next .turbo node_modules/.cache && echo 'âœ“ Cleaned build artifacts (preserved data/ and tmp/)' && npm run dev
scripts.e2e:smoke:ci: sh -c 'npm run dev -- --port 3000 > /tmp/next-dev.log 2>&1 & DEV_PID=$!; trap "pkill -P $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true; kill $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true; wait $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true" EXIT INT TERM; wait-on --timeout 120000 http://localhost:3000; set +e; PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 playwright test --project=smoke-billing-admin --project=smoke-billing-resident; CODE=$?; if [ $CODE -ne 0 ]; then tail -n 200 /tmp/next-dev.log || true; fi; exit $CODE'
scripts.e2e:office:ci: sh -c 'npm run dev -- --port 3000 > /tmp/next-dev.log 2>&1 & DEV_PID=$!; trap "pkill -P $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true; kill $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true; wait $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true" EXIT INT TERM; wait-on --timeout 120000 http://localhost:3000; set +e; PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 playwright test --project=smoke-office-admin; CODE=$?; if [ $CODE -ne 0 ]; then tail -n 200 /tmp/next-dev.log || true; fi; exit $CODE'
scripts.check:conflicts: node -e "const {execSync}=require('node:child_process');const patterns=['<'+'<<<<<','='+'=====','>'+'>>>>>'];const files=execSync('git ls-files').toString().trim().split('\\n').filter(Boolean);let bad=[];for(const f of files){try{const txt=execSync('cat '+f.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9/._-]/g,''),{encoding:'utf8'}).toString();if(patterns.some(p=>txt.includes(p))) bad.push(f);}catch(e){}}if(bad.length){console.error('Conflict markers found in:\\n'+bad.join('\\n'));process.exit(1);}"
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build && node scripts/release.js
